item.description:
Any Uconn Alum or fellow Huskies in the group?!

Wishmakers on Campus are organizing the 4th annual 3K/ 5K Fun Run at the Uconn Storrs campus on Saturday, May 4th to benefit the CT Make-A-Wish Foundation.

It’s the perfect event for all ability levels (3K course for walkers, 5K course for runners) and is a great way to visit the beautiful Uconn campus. Meet up with new friends, fellow Huskies, and Uconn’s lovable mascot, Jonathan the Husky XIII.

( More details at http://uconnwish.eventbrite.com/ )
item.name: Uconn 5K for the Make-A-Wish Foundation
